entry.title: [SQ] I'm gathering information about Gamergate for a small project of mine, and would
entry.content:
I'm gathering information about Gamergate for a small project of mine, and would like to get recommendations of analysis of that era. Do you remember any decent writeups? Maybe you were politically «awakened» around that time and could explain what it was about?
The main angle will probably be «apolitical escapists forced to contend with political operators in a space which is the primary habitat for the former and another platform for the latter, with second-order grifters springing to exploit the dissatisfaction». But this is all second-hand, I wasn't too interested in games or CW at that time.
